content.rendered:
[vc_row the1_padding=”padding-medium” the1_container=”1″][vc_column width=”5/12″]

Endlessly creative and focused on marketing expertise, we build unforgettable experiences that blend sports, art and entertainment.

Pulse Active is full-service event management curating highly customizable experiences for global brands including experiential marketing, physical/digital experiences, brand activation, brand consultancy, destination marketing. Our unique events are expertly curated to build excitement and joy while connecting brands with their audience in a personal way.

[vc_empty_space][vc_btn title=”Explore our capabilities ” style=”outline” link=”url:%2Fservices%2F||target:%20_blank|”][/vc_column][vc_column width=”7/12″]

This events, in turn, will become lasting memories for everyone involved.

[/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row the1_colorpicker=”#f7f7f7″][vc_column css=”.vc_custom_1539854094368{margin-top: -40px !important;}”]
IN NUMBERS
[/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row the1_padding=”padding-small”][vc_column]

  • K+Participants
  • +Artists
  • +Brands we worked with
  • +Locations
  • K+ Number of tourists attended
[/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column]

Latest Works !

What we do
  • ALL
  • Entertainment
  • Sports

IN HACKATHON 2022

LOTTE Downtown Duty-Free Pre-opening Concert 2019

Produced by Pulse Active, the concert was also the first concert of LOTTE Duty-Free and SM Entertainment in Vietnam opening a new era for K-Pop fans. This was part of a long-term plan to bring Korean entertainment closer to Vietnamese youth which means that more Korean artists will come to Vietnam for their next concerts in the future.
Check our more here.

COLOR ME RUN

A new festival concept which fuses music, colored powder running into one exhilarating event. It has become a phenomenon, a must-attend festival in Vietnam, especially amongst millennials. Check our more here.

Manulife Danang International Marathon

The Danang International Marathon has been held in the namesake coastal city since 2013, offering four distances: Full Marathon, Half Marathon, 10km and 5km. The race was the first marathon in Vietnam to be certified by AIMS and become a Boston Marathon classifier. Check out more here.     

HCMC Marathon

This landmark annual event gathers thousands of people from around the world to run the dynamic streets of Ho Chi Minh City and conquer the formidable Phu My Bridge. Check out more here. 

THE CHAINSMOKERS

Pulse Active brought the EDM-pop duo The Chainsmokers to Ho Chi Minh City for the first time, placing Vietnam firmly on the global EDM map. This was a crazy summer night at the hands of the famous DJ duo on their debut tour for Memories...Do Not Open.       

Entertainment

LOTTE Downtown Duty-Free Pre-opening Concert 2019

Produced by Pulse Active, the concert was also the first concert of LOTTE Duty-Free and SM Entertainment in Vietnam opening a new era for K-Pop fans. This was part of a long-term plan to bring Korean entertainment closer to Vietnamese youth which means that more Korean artists will come to Vietnam for their next concerts in the future.
Check our more here.
Category: Entertainment

Category: Entertainment

Category: Entertainment

Sports

The Danang International Marathon has been held in the namesake coastal city since 2013, offering four distances: Full Marathon, Half Marathon, 10km and 5km. The race was the first marathon in Vietnam to be certified by AIMS and become a Boston Marathon classifier. Check out more here.     
Category: Sports

This landmark annual event gathers thousands of people from around the world to run the dynamic streets of Ho Chi Minh City and conquer the formidable Phu My Bridge. Check out more here. 
Category: Sports
[/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column]
Still curious?
See more of our work!
SEE MORE WORK
[/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row the1_padding=”padding-medium”][vc_column]

In House

360º
ECOSYSTEM

EVENT CONCEPT & MANAGEMENT

Understanding both our audience and industry is essential to establishing and developing successful events, but we do not stop here. We use our innovative creativity to build brand-new event experiences.

read more

CREATIVITY & VISUAL

Experienced creativity and out-of-the-box thinking are central to everything we do.

read more

MARKETING & COMMUNICATION

With interactive marketing as our core medium, along with event design, video production and brand identity, our campaigns aim to directly engage brands with participants.

read more

OPERATION & PRODUCTION

At every step along the way from concept to reality, we guarantee top-notch event site production and logistics.

read more

EVENT TECHNOLOGY

Our skills and equipment ensure that every step before, during and after an event is carried out efficiently and professionally.

read more

MERCHANDISE

With accumulated knowledge and sufficient experience in both process and technology, we provide our clients with exceptional merchandise products that can tell your brand's story,

read more

REGISTRATION

We provide all of the online registration and ticketing tools to help you create your payment service.

read more

BRAND ACTIVATION

We create unforgettable, unique brand experiences at anywhere customers can engage in your brand activation. Thereby, it help to secure brand partiality, loyalty, as well as increase sales.

read more
[/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row css=”.vc_custom_1495669055113{padding-top: 105px !important;padding-bottom: 110px !important;background-color: #f7f7f7 !important;}”][vc_column]
We constantly strive to integrate sponsors into our events while providing rich experiences for participants.
How brands can join us
[/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column]

Achievements

AWARDS & CERTIFICATES
WE'VE ACHIEVED
[vc_images_carousel images=”1254,1012,1011,1002,1010,1009,1008,1007,1006,1005,1004,1075″ img_size=”large” autoplay=”yes” hide_pagination_control=”yes” wrap=”yes” css_animation=”zoomIn”]
[/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row the1_padding=”padding-small”][vc_column]

Sponsorship

BRANDS
WE'VE WORKED WITH
[/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row the1_container=”1″][vc_column]

“Everyday is a new day at Pulse Active and I'm always excited about it. There are definitely challenges but through smart-and-hard work, we find solutions to overcome obstacles, learn from experience to improve ourselves, seize opportunities to achieve strategic innovation, while creating moments together along the way.”

Lucy DuongManaging Partner

“Pulse Active is unique! Once you join this team, there’s no way back, as it creates some addition. Pulse is going to make you discover yourself, where your limits are while challenging you in many ways. Some of these challenges, you will need guts and courage to achieve them but once you do so, that feeling is incomparable... and if on the way you need help, you always have the Pulse family which will back you up and support you! Together we make things happen, that's just how we work and who we are!”

Mai LinhPrevious Marketing Intern, current Marketing Full Time Member
[/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][/vc_column][/vc_row]
